Articles.Content:
Hi. I just got a new Inspiron 15 3000 and use a lot of mods with KSP. However, the laptop's memory couldn't handle it and KSP crashes while loading. Opengl failed so I used active texture management. But this is what happened.       https://www.dropbox.com/s/9pc4ydjijdmzgd4/Screenshot (1).png?dl=0      Does anyone know how to either fix the texture or reduce memory used?

Edited December 31, 2017 by mikemike204

Active Texture Management is a very outdated mod. Its last update was for version 1.0.

Maybe thats the problem.

Edited December 29, 2017 by WaffleScience
Makes sense. I was hoping for another solution.
